author: sussman
msg: * STATUS: add r8463 as a 1.0 candidiate.

author: cmpilato
msg: Do a big chunk of Issue #1709, in which the Universe is perturbed by
mod_dav_svn continuing to spew data into a dead socket.
* subversion/include/svn_error_codes.h
(SVN_ERR_APMOD_CONNECTION_ABORTED): New.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/log.c
(send_xml): Now return an svn_error_t *, and check the status of the
socket write.
(maybe_send_header): Now return an svn_error_t *.  Update calls to
send_xml().
(log_receiver): Update calls to changed functions.
(dav_svn__log_report): Update calls to changed functions, and rework
the error handling.  Sending back a <log-item> with error data is
just completely bogus, and the client doesn't appear to do
anything with it anyway.  So, rather than falsify data, just let
the client fail with an XML parse error.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/update.c
(send_xml): Now return an svn_error_t *, and check the status of the
socket write.
(send_vsn_url, open_helper, close_helper): Now return an svn_error_t *,
and update calls to changed functions.
(add_helper, absent_helper, maybe_start_update_report,
upd_set_target_revision, upd_open_root, upd_delete_entry,
upd_change_xxx_prop, upd_close_directory, upd_open_file,
window_handler, upd_close_file): Update calls to changed functions.
(dav_svn__update_report): Update calls to changed functions, and
re-work the error handling here significantly.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/version.c
(dav_svn__drev_report): Check errors from buckets writes.

author: ghudson
msg: Merge r8287.
In svn_add_diffs.pl, change regex to match new r\d+ revision format
from 'svn log'.
Approved by: blair, brane
